application.doc: Retrieving the list of permitted features for a user

param.name: user
param.doc: The username to get the authorization features for.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the list of permitted features for a user
method.doc: To retrieve the list of permitted features for a user, issue an HTTP GET command on the authorization roles resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: Authorization Permission
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: feature
param.doc: The name of the feature the access permission is set on. See the topic 'Retrieving the list of features ' to retrieve a list of valid features.

param.name: access
param.doc: The type of access permitted for this feature. Valid values are 'r' for read, and 'w' for read-write.
